title: Tender Greens
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Assembly line concept salad restaurant with multiple locations. Build-your-own or order from its menu which includes a "happy vegan" (wheat with cranberry and hazelnuts, quinoa with cucumber and beets, green hummus, tabbouleh, greens), a grilled and roasted vegetables but need to request no aioli (contains egg). Or ask to omit cheese on the other salads and sub for another topping. Usually a vegan soup each day.
